author: Shawna Chen
title: Interior to pay $1.7B to fulfill tribal water rights settlements
description: "I am grateful that Tribes ... are finally getting the resources they are owed," Deb Haaland said.
content:
Sixteen tribal nations will receive $1.7 billion as part of Indian water rights settlements, Interior Secretary Deb Haaland announced Tuesday.
Why it matters: Over the years, at least 34 tribes haveâ€¦ [+1637 chars]
